# IdsFacts.GetValidRestrictions method

Provides the list of valid restriction nodes for a base type for a given IDS version.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<string> GetValidRestrictions(string xsType, IdsVersion version)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| xsType | String representation of the type (needs to start with "xs:") |
| version | the required version |

## Return Value

a string including the "xs:" prefix
